column5: Great report and some great photos looks like you boys had a great time love the Chapleau area will be Flying into the Chapleau game preserve again this year for our annual fly in Trip thanks for sharing.  Cheers Mitch...
That's great. It was our first time in the Chapleau area and it didn't disappoint.
I searched high and low to find an outfitter that fit your budget and schedule. Can't tell you how pleased I am that you guys enjoyed a good trip!!!
